channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Software, news, and environmental CEOs reveal how they’re using AI to transform their businesses
item.description: As emerging technologies like generative AI advance quickly, companies across all sectors are rethinking how to maintain an edge.

item.title: Southwest Airlines tells staff 'difficult decisions' ahead in push to boost profits
item.description: Southwest will provide more detail about its plans to raise profits at an investor day on Sept. 26.

item.title: PMI data show U.S. business losing some momentum this month
Global health leaders pen open letter to ‘those with the power to prevent lives being lost to the climate crisis’
item.description: There is simply not enough money being invested to help communities and local healthcare systems adapt to the health threats of climate change.

item.title: U.S. billionaire Dan Friedkin agrees to buy EPL soccer club Everton
item.description: The deal is subject to subject to regulatory approval from the EPL, the Football Association, and Britain's Financial Conduct Authority.

item.title: A gut-wrenching three months lie ahead for stock-market investors
Jamie Dimon is bothered by federal employees not working in their D.C. offices 5 days a week
item.description: JPMorgan’s CEO Jamie Dimon is not a fan of hybrid working—so much so, that he’s even taking issue with the few days D.C. federal employees work from h...

item.title: Microsoft downgraded on fear its AI lead over Amazon and Google is gone
item.description: D.A. Davidson believes that "Microsoft has been escalating an arms race it may not be able to win."

item.title: These 14 highflying stocks may face crash peril. Nvidia is one of them.
Harris has been outspending Trump by $5 million a day since recent donation surge
item.description: Harris has continued to ramp up spending. She’s spending $152 million on advertising in September, more than double the $63 million Trump is spending.

item.title: Minneapolis Fed President Kashkari sees a slower pace of rate cuts ahead
item.description: Kashkari said Monday that he expects to dial down the pace of interest rate reductions after the central bank eased policy by a half percentage point ...

item.title: Gold has surged 700% since Bernanke's famous helicopter drop speech in '02
Turkey wants to protect döner kebabs as its own. But Germany’s $2.6 billion kebab industry has a bone to pick with it
item.description: Germany's connection with döner kebabs are similar to Britain's to chicken tikka masala—whatever the provenance might be, the dish is culturally speci...

item.title: GM's EV sales momentum is finally building as new vehicle lineup fills out
item.description: Two back-to-back record months for GM's EV sales have it within striking distance of Ford through August.

item.title: Stocks poised for first September gain in 5 years. Are more good times ahead?
